metadata.title: CVE-2024-50131 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tracing: Consider the NULL character when validating the event lengthstrlen() returns a string length excluding the null byte. If the stringlength equals to the maximum buffer length, the buffer will have nospace for the NULL terminating character.This commit checks this condition and returns failure for it.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
